attributes.action: ask the USA to stop using "waterboarding" to gain confessions from prisoners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: waterboarding is the practice of preteding to drown somebody as you interrogate them. the US admits to using this. david milliband has expressed concerns on this matter, but something actually needs to be done.  it is quite likely that the 6 men on trial for 9/11 are going to be interrogated using this method - how will we know if their testimonies are true if they are gained using waterboarding?
